greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of set partitions of [n] with maximal block length multiplicity equal to two.
comment: At least one block length occurs exactly 2 times, and all block lengths occur at most 2 times.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 2..648
maple: b:= proc(n, i, k) option remember; `if`(n=0, 1,
mathematica: b[n_, i_, k_] := b[n, i, k] = If[n == 0, 1, If[i < 1, 0, Sum[multinomial[n, Join[{n - i*j}, Table[i, j]]]*b[n - i*j, i - 1, k]/j!, {j, 0, Min[k, n/i] }]]];
Table[a[n], {n, 2, 30}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, May 08 2018, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Apr 13 2016
